Fish Class Reference

This is your primary unit for Reef. It will perform all of your major actions (pickup, attack, move, drop). It stats are based off of its species. More...

Detailed Description

This is your primary unit for Reef. It will perform all of your major actions (pickup, attack, move, drop). It stats are based off of its species.
